title: Public Records Request - 30500 Railroad Street West, Ardmore

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records pertaining to Wolverine Tube Inc. located at 30500 Railroad Street in Ardmore, Tennessee (Division of Remediation Site ID numbers 28502 and 28511). The facility was listed on the Voluntary Cleanup Program Inventory (VCP), State Remediation Program List (SRP), and Toxics Release Inventory System (TRIS) databases. The facility may be listed under the name Universal Oil. For the facility's VCP/SRP participation, please include the following record types, if available: initial incident reports, initial site investigations, subsequent site investigations (may be called a "further site investigation" or similar), quarterly groundwater monitoring reports, remedial action plans, remedial action completion reports,  and site closure/no further action (NFA) documentation. As it pertains to the TRIS listing, please include the facility's Tier II reports, Form Rs, and material safety data sheets (MSDS). TRI ID 38449WLVRNRAILR.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Caitlin Downey.
